column4: hi guys :) I am trying to sudo apt-get install vmware-server in gutsy 64-bit, and I get this error: http://pastebin.com/m6a388b7
you'd have to remove the lib32rsvg2-common package to install the vmware-server package
using --force* with dpkg may not be a good idea, as any upgrade to vmware-server or lib32rsvg2-common will produce the same error again
